participant_1.background:
I don t cook and usually eat out.
I have trouble losing weight.
I am near sighted and wear contact lenses.
I am a very short woman.

participant_2.background:
My favorite meal is chicken and rice.
I read autobiographies before bed.
My favorite band is metallica.
I regularly go to the gym.

content.text: Hello, what do you like to do for fun?
I love reading autobiographies before bed. It's a great way to relax and learn about other people's lives.
That sounds like a great way to unwind. I don't really read that much, but I do like to watch documentaries.
I love documentaries too! They're so informative and interesting.
Me too. I recently watched a documentary about the history of rock music. It was really fascinating.
That sounds like a really good documentary. I love rock music! Do you have a favorite band?
I do! My favorite band is Metallica.
Metallica! I love them too! They're one of my favorite bands.
That's great! We should get together sometime and listen to some Metallica.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I would love to do that.
Great! We can exchange phone numbers and make plans.
Sounds good!
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I also like to go to the gym. I'm trying to get in shape and I find that working out helps me to de-stress.
That's great! I need to start working out more. I'm not very active and I'm starting to feel it.
You should! Working out is really good for you. It can help you to lose weight, tone up, and improve your overall health.
I know, I know. I need to get on it.
You can do it! I believe in you.
Thanks! I appreciate the encouragement.
No problem. So, what are you doing later today?
I'm not sure yet. I might go out to dinner with some friends.
That sounds fun! I'm going to stay in and watch a movie.
Oh, that sounds like fun too. What movie are you going to watch?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about watching a comedy.
That sounds like a good choice. I love comedies.
Me too! They're the best way to relax and have a good time.
Definitely! I'm sure you'll have a great time watching your movie.
Thanks! I think I will too.
